column2: A school in Kasan got attacked 11 killed 1 culprit shot and killed
column5: edition.cnn.com/…  Moscow (CNN)Seven children were killed and at least 16 people injured on Tuesday after a gunman opened fire in a school in the Russian city of Kazan according to the country's National Anti-Terrorism Committee. www.bild.de/…  They were mostly 8th graders according to Rustam Minnichanow (64) president of Tatarstan. 12 pupils and 4 adults were taken to hospitals. He called it a great tragedy.  According to RIA Nowosti (news agency) one culprit was caught and arrested. There was a msg on Telegram shortly ahead of the terrorist act given by the perpetrators.
